text: Arau te'omra nidarsanaralira majata ache ye, teraemi tomalokara babe tomalokara majara paraa tomalokara yoraa srsti karaiche, yate tomaloke sihamtara paraa prasanti labha karaa arau teraemi tomalokara majata parasparaika praema arau sneha srsti karaiche. Niscaya iyata ache bahuto nidarsana se'i sampradayara babe yisakale garaesana karae
